description: Succulent roast chicken recipe with a golden garlic and panko breadcrumb coating is a must try for a delicious and easy dinner.
name: Cheesy ‘Garlic Bread’Crusted Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5kg Woolworths RSPCA Approved Seasoned Whole Chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Place chicken in a large roasting pan lined with baking paper. Using unwaxed kitchen string tie legs together and tuck wings under chicken. Combine breadcrumbs, half the parmesan, garlic powder and 2 tsp oil in a small bowl. Sprinkle crumb mixture over chicken, pressing onto skin to secure. Roast for 1 hour or until chicken is cooked through and the crumb mixture has formed a golden crust.

Cook broccolini in a large saucepan of boiling water for 3 minutes or until bright green and tender. Drain. Place half the broccolini on a serving plate. Top with remaining parmesan and season with pepper.
Place chicken on a serving platter. Arrange remaining broccolini around chicken, top with oregano and season with pepper. Serve with cheesy broccolini and lemon wedges.
